title: Social Interaction-Based Mobile Learning Design: Mathematics Field Problem-Solving Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge and practical fieldwork experience
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning utilizing VR simulations and mobile technology in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can record and analyze social interactions with peers using mobile devices and VR simulations to solve complex mathematical problems
Learners can visualize and evaluate mathematical reasoning processes based on digitally captured interaction data
Learners can create concept maps explaining the connectivity between physical environments and digital learning content
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
